channel.title: Idea!
channel.description: I dont know if this is possible, well it is, but I dont know if anyone would want to do it. Make a private server (named after mopar or something) and have it all like normal members runescape. Therefore we could play legit on that w/ members and it could be everyone on these forums. We could pk and stuff, but all legit! I think it would be fun, but only servers are fun when they are 24/7.
